description:
Whether you are a Curling fan or you want to discover a new sport game, you'll enjoy playing Curling in its one player game or local multiplayer game .
Curling has beed designed to be as close as possible to reality while providing best gameplay.

With this game, you'll be able to:

-Tune finely stones direction, force and spin
-Sweep to influence stone speed and direction
-Play Against 3 AI Levels 
-Play multiplayer with friends and family on same device (local 2 players game)

Time to compete!
name: Curling
